This is so exiting!

DLG SPR_7
It's so hot and sandy here

DLG SPR_8

DLG SPR_9
This is the Trainmaster's house

DLG SPR_a
I think I'll take the other route, it could be quicker.

DLG SPR_b
This isn't the way to the Trainmaster's house

DLG SPR_c

DLG SPR_d

DLG SPR_e
This is where my friend lives

DLG SPR_f

DLG SPR_g
My friend is a very efficient locomotive, she always gets the most difficult deliveries.

END 0
Delivery Delivered! Well done, the Trainmaster is very pleased!

END 1
Oh no! You delivered the package to the wrong address! Hopefully the Trainmaster will give you a second chance.
